channel.title: Spell book interface help
channel.description: Hey, I have to clients. One with the new spell book looks. Like the teleports etc... And one with the old one. And I have toms cache editor and when I open them both up I can the the new spells and then on my other window the old one. So I am wondering how to transfer the new ones from one client to another

item.title: Spell book interface help
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

Ok thank you very much.
Nver knew what dumping was haha

Read full topic

item.title: Spell book interface help
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

just click the new teleport icon inside toms cache and them dump it as a .png, then just transfer it over to the other client.

P.S: make sure the name of the file is the same as the one you are replacing

for example: if you dump 7.png, you will have to input the new one as 7.png

Read full topic
